### 2025 Conference Schedule

List of seminars and conferences that the CAMIS team will be attending in 2025.

If you are a volunteer on the CAMIS project and plan to present at a seminar or conference, please add details of the conference below. For help with slides or content go to [HERE](https://github.com/PSIAIMS/CAMIS/tree/main/non_website_content/conferences).

**If you want a single slide which advertises the CAMIS project, you can find this** [HERE](https://github.com/PSIAIMS/CAMIS/tree/main/non_website_content/conferences/2024/PHUSE%20CSS%20CAMIS%20Single%20slide%202024.pptx)

To cite the CAMIS project work in online content or presentations please use: "Content reproduced with the permission of [PHUSE CAMIS](https://advance.phuse.global/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=327874) - A DVOST Working Group".
